  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1664</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fruits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Früchte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fruits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frutas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frutte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φρούτα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frutas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners will know the fruits vocabulary (read writes and understands the meaning of them). Using computer based skills</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fruits</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger kennen den Fruchtwortschatz 
(gelesen schreibt und versteht die Bedeutung von ihnen). 
Verwenden der rechnergestützten Fähigkeiten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants sauront le vocabulaire de fruits 
(lu écrit et comprend la signification d'eux). Utilisation des 
qualifications sur ordinateur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners saberão o vocabulário das frutas 
(lido escreve e compreende o meaning deles). Usar o computador 
baseou habilidades</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti conosceranno il vocabolario delle 
frutte (colto scrive loro e capisce loro il significato). Usando
le abilità computerizzate</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι ξέρουν το λεξιλόγιο φρούτων (που 
διαβάζεται γράφει και καταλαβαίνει την έννοια τους). 
Χρησιμοποίηση των βασισμένων σε υπολογιστή δεξιοτήτων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes sabrán el vocabulario de las 
frutas (leído escribe y entiende el significado de ellos). Usar
habilidades computarizadas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Früchte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fruits</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
